sentence: In early trading on Wednesday, shares of JPMorgan Chase ( JPM ) topped the list of the day's best performing Dow Jones Industrial Average components, trading up 0.7%.
Year to date, JPMorgan Chase registers a 5.9% gain.
And the worst performing Dow component thus far on the day is Chevron Corporation ( CVX ), trading down 1.2%.
Chevron Corporation is lower by about 10.6% looking at the year to date performance.
Two other components making moves today are Procter & Gamble Company ( PG ), trading down 1.2%, and General Electric ( GE ), trading up 0.6% on the day.
The views and opinions expressed herein are the views and opinions of the author and do not necessarily reflect those of Nasdaq, Inc.
